# Tregioia Creamery - Natural Ice Cream Jakarta & Tangerang

## Business Information
- Name: Tregioia Creamery
- Type: Artisanal natural ice cream shop
- Founded: 2008
- Locations: 6 locations across Jakarta and Tangerang, Indonesia
- Specialty: Natural ice cream made without artificial additives

## Key Products
- Natural ice cream made with pure ingredients
- No artificial colors, synthetic flavors, emulsifiers, stabilizers, or chemical preservatives
- Fresh fruit purees made in-house from market-bought fruits
- Natural cocoa, ground vanilla beans, real vanilla extracts
- Oven-roasted nuts, homemade baked cakes and brownies

## Locations
1. Tregioia Creamery Alam Sutera - Ruko Element, Jl. Jalur Sutera No.03 kav 25BC no C, South Tangerang
2. Tregioia Creamery @Hublife - GroundFloor GF-26, West Jakarta  
3. Tregioia Creamery @Citra8 - Citra Garden City, West Jakarta
4. Tregioia Creamery Futopia - Jl. Jalur Sutera Bar. No.Kav. 16, Tangerang
5. Tregioia Creamery @YOMS - Graha Emerald Premium, Gading Serpong, Tangerang
6. Tregioia Creamery @Maggiore - Ruko Maggiore Square, Pagedangan, Tangerang

## Target Keywords
- es krim alami Jakarta
- natural ice cream Jakarta
- gelato artisan Jakarta
- es krim sehat Tangerang
- artisanal ice cream Serpong
- organic ice cream Jakarta
- handmade gelato Jakarta
- premium ice cream Tangerang
